simpledc.title: Philosophy at Cambridge, Newsletter of the Faculty of Philosophy
Philosophy at Cambridge
simpledc.creator: Lecky-Thompson, Jenni
simpledc.subject: philosophy
simpledc.description: Newsletter of the Philosophy Faculty. Articles by: Tim Crane, 'From the Chair' ; John Marenbon, 'Medieval Philosophy Comes to Cambridge'; Derek Matravers, 'The Beautiful and the Good'; Huw Price & Tim Crane, 'Huw Price in Conversation with Tim Crane'; Harry Adamson, 'Public Philosophy'; Hallvard Lillehammer, 'Mellon Seminars in Ethics, Philosophy and Anthropology'; Carlene Firman, 'Becoming More Thoughtful'.
simpledc.publisher: Faculty of Philosophy, University of Cambridge
